Bloom

bloom
APPL
$(FLUTTER_BUILD_NAME)
$(FLUTTER_BUILD_NUMBER)
Bloom needs your permission to access the media database for use in uploading avatars / reviews
Bloom needs your permission to access Bluetooth pairing hardware. If it is prohibited, it will not be able to pair hardware
Bloom needs your permission to access Bluetooth pairing hardware. If it is prohibited, it will not be able to pair hardware
Bloom needs your permission to access the calendar for use in reviews
Bloom needs your permission to access the camera and select pictures for use in uploading avatars / reviews
Bloom needs your permission to access the address book to identify the user. If it is prohibited, the user will not be identified
Bloom needs your consent to use local network to connect to other devices under the local network to enable the screen projection function
Bloom needs your consent to access the location and display nearby information. If it is prohibited, it will not be able to display nearby information
Bloom needs your consent to continuously access the location and display continuously updated information. If it is prohibited, it will not be able to continuously update the location information
Bloom needs your consent to continuously access the location and display continuously updated information. If it is prohibited, it will not be able to continuously update the location information
In order to facilitate you to use the voice messages, Bloom needs to access your microphone permissions
Bloom needs your permission to access motion
Bloom needs to use your photos for normal use of services such as saving pictures
Bloom needs your permission to access the album and select pictures for use in uploading avatars / reviews
Bloom needs your permission to access voice rights for use in comments

Main
